participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: energetic and adventurous, looking forward to independence and fun.
participant_1.background: i am 19 and i cannot wait to move out of my parents' home. i just want to have fun with my friends. i do not drink or do drugs or anything. i work at burger king.

participant_2.name: Rachel
participant_2.personality: caring and supportive, enjoys family life and outdoor activities.
participant_2.background: i've a german shepherd dog. i live in a rural farming community. my husband is adopted. i like to watch nhl hockey.

content.text: i am a little tired from work
me too. after a long day of work, i like to watch hockey. what about you?
